election_record.label: North Carolina 1820 Electoral College

sub_unit.name: Halifax
sub_unit.note: The votes for Henry J. G. Ruffin in Halifax County were listed as for Charles J. G. Ruffin.

sub_unit.name: Johnston
sub_unit.note: No persons voted in Johnston County.

sub_unit.name: Martin
sub_unit.note: No persons voted in Martin County.

sub_unit.name: Moore
sub_unit.note: No votes were taken in Moore County.

election_record.reference: Original Election Certificate. State Archives of North Carolina, Raleigh.
Miscellaneous Collection, Compiled Presidential Returns of North Carolina from 1816-1832. L. P. 325.
North Carolina Department of Cultural Resources. Legislative Papers. L.P. 325.
